Transmutate comes on line momentarily.

Mutate: Internal repairs.

His systems begin a slow repair process. He losses
conciousness again.

OOC: I'll bring him back if he doesn't get help by
Christmas.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> ::Prowl/Skyburst::
> 
> Prowl watched as most of the damage was repaired by
> the nano bots that
> maintain the city.
> "That technology is amazing."
> 
> The Autobot Skyburst flew overhead, and transformed.
> "How does your base repair itself like that, Prowl?"
> 
> "Nano bot technology," answered Prowl.
> 
> "Interesting. Well back to work."
> 
> Both Prowl and Skyburst go back to work.
>
